title: Fear Over Love—The Calculated Reign
subtitle: To be loved is to be vulnerable. Fear is a stronger chain than affection. Inspire respect through decisive action and the threat of consequence. Mercy breeds entitlement; discipline breeds order. Let your subjects tremble at the thought of crossing you—but never push them to hatred, for even the most cunning ruler cannot survive a mob’s wrath.

images.caption: A ruler on a dark throne, subjects kneeling in fear under cold, harsh light.
